pullrequest.title: Remove fuel-tools3 until it is released

content.raw: no problem. The best way to have jobs generated but disabled \(it can be enabled manually for testing\) would be to create a branch with the changes and run the dsl\_ignition job with that custom branch. After that run the dsl\_ignition job again with `default` branch and the jobs will be disabled but not removed.
content.html: no problem. The best way to have jobs generated but disabled (it can be enabled manually for testing) would be to create a branch with the changes and run the dsl_ignition job with that custom branch. After that run the dsl_ignition job again with default branch and the jobs will be disabled but not removed.
